title: Executive Order 5443-Power-Site Restoration No. 446
content: So much of the order of May 27, 1913, creating Power-Site Reserve No. 364, as affects the lands hereinafter described, is hereby revoked:
T. 33 N., R. 1 W., sec. 22, NE. ¼ of SW. ¼, S. ½ of SW. ¼;                             sec. 24, SW. ¼ of NE. ¼.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5443-Power-Site Restoration No. 446 Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/373064
